div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1782 Midyat environs, c. 40 km. N of Nu- saybin (anc. Nisibis), Mesopotamia, before 1950 Burial: c. 80 B.C. (M) Contents: 40+ AR Antiochus VIII: 16 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Antiochus IX: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Philip Philadelphus: 23 tetradr. (An- tiocheia) Disposition: Istanbul 40
